title: Deep Link Examples - Document Attached
custom_preconds: You can copy and paste the Deep Links from the attached Word document to a new e-mail message and then e-mail to the e-mail address setup on the device(s) you are going to test Deep Links on.

title: Team - Team ID
custom_preconds: Given a user has MLB app installed on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user opens Safari
and navigates to a Team Page (Team ID) Deep Link

mlbatbat://team?team_id=111

custom_steps_separated.content: With the app not open in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Opens team page for Boston Red Sox

custom_steps_separated.content: With the app running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Opens team page for Boston Red Sox

custom_steps_separated.content: With a modal (News Article or Gameday Audio) open in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Opens team page for Boston Red Sox

custom_steps_separated.content: With Gameday open in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Opens team page for Boston Red Sox

custom_steps_separated.content: with a Favorite Team set with the app running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Opens team page for Boston Red Sox
and able to change tabs and teams

custom_steps_separated.content: with no Favorite Team set with the app running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Opens team page for Boston Red Sox
and able to dismiss Team Page by tapping Done

custom_steps_separated.expected:

(Note: content may not have been in index but should still be displayed)

title: Scoreboard - Game
custom_preconds: Given a user has iOS At Bat installed on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user opens Safari
and navigates to a Scoreboard Deep Link

mlbatbat://scoreboard?state=expanded&gameid=2016_07_09_anamlb_balmlb_1/

Get Game ID by navigating to a year, month, day:
Prod - http://gdx.mlb.com/components/game/mlb/year_2016/
QA - http://gd.qa.mlb.com/components/game/mlb/year_2016/

custom_steps_separated.content: With the app not open in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Opens Scoreboard to date and scrolls to Game

custom_steps_separated.content: With the app running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Opens Scoreboard to date and scrolls to Game

custom_steps_separated.content: With a modal (News Article or Gameday Audio) open in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Opens Scoreboard to date and scrolls to Game

custom_steps_separated.content: With Gameday open in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Opens Scoreboard to date and scrolls to Game

title: Scoreboard - Game out of Range
custom_preconds:
Given a user has iOS At Bat installed on an iOS device
and 2016 is the supported season
custom_steps:
When a user opens Safari
and navigates to a Scoreboard Game Deep Link for a game in 2015 (out of range)

mlbatbat://scoreboard?state=expanded&gameid=2015_05_08_cinmlb_chamlb_1/

custom_steps_separated.content: With the app not open in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Opens scoreboard to current date and presents message "Game not found."

custom_steps_separated.content: With the app running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Opens scoreboard to current date and presents message "Game not found."

custom_steps_separated.content: With a modal (News Article or Gameday Audio) open in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Opens scoreboard to current date and presents message "Game not found."

custom_steps_separated.content: With Gameday open in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Opens scoreboard to current date and presents message "Game not found."

mlbatbat://stats?game_type=D (DS)
mlbatbat://stats?game_type=L (LCS)
mlbatbat://stats?game_type=W (WS)
mlbatbat://stats?game_type=F  (WC)

title: Stats - Stat Category
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user opens Safari
and navigate to a Stats w/ Stat Category Deep Link

mlbatbat://stats?stat=avg  

Batting:
AVG, HR, RBI, SB, R, OBP, SLG, OPS, H, 2B, 3B, BB, SO, CS, G, AB
Pitching:
ERA, W, SO, SV, WHIP, BAA, IP, CG, G, GS, L, SVO, ER, R, H, HR, BB
Fielding:
G, GS, INN, TC, PO, A, E, DP, SB, CS, SBPCT, PB, C_WP, FPCT, RF

custom_steps_separated.content: With the app not open in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Open to specific Stat

custom_steps_separated.content: With the app running in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Open to specific Stat

custom_steps_separated.content: With a modal (News Article or Gameday Audio) open in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Open to specific Stat

custom_steps_separated.content: With Gameday open in the background
custom_steps_separated.expected: Open to specific Stat

title: Deeplinks -> Add support for Safari view controller as a deeplink (auth and unauth)

* The webview url is encoded as base64, which is a requirement

url=aHR0cDovL21sYi5tbGIuY29tL2hvbWU%3D
custom_steps: Given a user follows this link:  mlbatbat://externalWebview?url=aHR0cDovL21sYi5tbGIuY29tL2hvbWU%3D
custom_expected: Then the app will open and will then re-direct to a webpage

title: Deep Link Support->Gameday
custom_preconds:
* User is signed in
* Game is not in preview
custom_steps: Given the user enters the following deep links (please note that the gamepk within the deep link is subject to change):

custom_steps_separated.content: mlbatbat://game?gamepk=662571&game_tab=videos
custom_steps_separated.expected: User will be taken to videos section of Game-day

custom_steps_separated.content: mlbatbat://game?gamepk=662571&game_tab=plays
custom_steps_separated.expected: User will be taken to Plays Tab of Game-day

custom_steps_separated.content: mlbatbat://game?gamepk=662571&game_tab=boxscore
custom_steps_separated.expected: User will be taken to boxscore tab of Game-Day

custom_steps_separated.content: mlbatbat://game?gamepk=662571&game_tab=summary
custom_steps_separated.expected: User will be taken the summary page of Game-Day
